description: Rodney, a raffish cat, is an actor in an animated TV commercial who proudly reveals the process of promoting 'Soopergoop', a new breakfast cereal. The commercial aims and selling techniques which are used are revealed in a most amusing manner. Shows how children are exploited by appealing to their desires and how they are manipulated to persuade their parents to buy the fictitious breakfast cereal "Soopergoop". Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels
